Detailed Description

This file provides the testdog::runner class and associated types.

See also:
testdog::runner

Define Documentation

 
#define TDOG (  )     testdog::runner::global()

Synonym for: testdog::runner::global().

This macro is provided for convenience. The following two lines of code are equivalent:

Example:

 // 1. Run all tests
 int rslt = testdog::runner::global().run();
 ...
 // 2. Run all tests
 int rslt = TDOG().run();
See also:
runner::global()
